nodes.text: The B22 was a mechanically activated blaster pistol produced by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. and used during the Galactic Civil War. During the Siege of Inyusu Tor, in 3 ABY, The Imperial Captain Tabor Seitaron owned one of these pistols as a sidearm and used it in an attempt to break up a fight between Prelate Verge and the former governor, now a Rebel Alliance asset, Everi Chalis aboard the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Herald. Although the captain intended to shoot Chalis, he accidentally shot and killed Verge instead.
The B22 first appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
